original_text: And Abigail came to Nabal, and behold, he was holding a feast in his house, like the feast of a king. And Nabal's heart was merry within him, for he was very drunk. So she told him nothing at all until the morning light.
korean_text: 아비가일이 나발에게로 돌아오니 그가 왕의 잔치와 같은 잔치를 그의 집에 배설하고 크게 취하여 마음에 기뻐하므로 아비가일이 밝는 아침까지는 아무 말도 하지 아니하다가

sentences.original_text: and behold, he was holding a feast in his house,
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그는 자기 집에서 잔치를 베풀고 있었으니,

sentences.original_text: like the feast of a king.
And Nabal's heart was merry within him,
So she told him nothing at all
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 그에게 아무 말도 하지 않았으니,
